quests.name: Cook's Assistant
quotes: It's the Duke of Lumbridge's birthday and I have to help his Cook make him a birthday cake. To do this I need to bring him the following ingredients:
I need to find a bucket of milk. There's a cattle field east of Lumbridge, I should make sure I take an empty bucket with me.
I have found a bucket of milk to give to the cook.
